page.title: 20Ecology
page.content: The ecology of the area is typical of 1985 urban development.Open moorland has been eroded as the mill towns have grown and housing has spread out of the valleys.The natural flora and fauna has adapted its habitat to gardens,wasteland and motorway verges as the road network has spread and villages merge along the valleys. {Domesday Project Members. { ----------------------------- { Brownhill St.Saviour's:Mr Forster { Gomersal C.E First:Mrs Potter { St.Patrick's:Miss Taylor { Birstall St.Peter's:Mr Kale { Birstall County Primary: { Mr.Englefield { Birkenshaw County First: { Miss Fletcher {
